comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Lord Ashby St. Ledgers organized the British polo team which tried to win back the cup, in play in the U. S. in 1913 and 1914.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- there is no hyphen in the name of Lord Ashby St. Ledgers.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivor_Guest,_1st_Viscount_Wimborne "Ivor Churchill Guest, 1st Viscount Wimborne PC (16 January 1873 – 14 June 1939), known as the Lord Ashby St Ledgers from 1910 to 1914 and as the Lord Wimborne from 1914 to 1918, was a British politician, and one of the last Lords Lieutenant of Ireland, serving in that position at the time of the Easter Rising."

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you Wystan and Swang for the additional information on Lord Ashby St Ledgers. We will add some of it to the image description.
